Robot Football/RobotFootball/StrategyTestBench/StrategyTestBench.cpp

00001 // StrategyTestBench.cpp : Defines the entry point for the console application.
00002 //
00003 
00004 #include "stdafx.h"
00005 #include "..\..\..\Simulator\Strategy Source\Strategy.h"
00006 
00007 #include "..\SquareStrategy\PathController.h"
00008 
00009 #define CM_TO_INCHES(X) (X / 2.54)
00010 #define LEFT_X (FLEFTX + CM_TO_INCHES(55))
00011 #define RIGHT_X (FRIGHTX - CM_TO_INCHES(55))
00012 #define TOP_Y (FTOP - CM_TO_INCHES(30))
00013 #define BOTTOM_Y (FBOT + CM_TO_INCHES(30))
00014 
00015 #define STRAIGHT_LINE_POS(STARTPOS, ENDPOS, TIME, PERIOD) ((ENDPOS - STARTPOS) * (TIME) / PERIOD + STARTPOS)
00016 #define PATH_LENGTH 1500
00017 
00018 int _tmain(int argc, _TCHAR* argv[])
00019 {
00020         ControlFunction sec1 = [](time_t t)->Vector3D{
00021                 Vector3D result;
00022                 if (t < PATH_LENGTH)
00023                 {
00024                         result.x = STRAIGHT_LINE_POS(LEFT_X, RIGHT_X, t, PATH_LENGTH);
00025                         result.y = TOP_Y;
00026                 }
00027                 else
00028                 {
00029                         result.x = result.y = -1;
00030                 }
00031                 return result;
00032         };
00033         ControlFunction sec2 = [](time_t t)->Vector3D{
00034                 Vector3D result;
00035                 if (t < PATH_LENGTH)
00036                 {
00037                         result.x = RIGHT_X;
00038                         result.y = STRAIGHT_LINE_POS(TOP_Y, BOTTOM_Y, t, PATH_LENGTH);
00039                 }
00040                 else
00041                 {
00042                         result.x = result.y = -1;
00043                 }
00044                 return result;
00045         };
00046         ControlFunction sec3 = [](time_t t)->Vector3D{
00047                 Vector3D result;
00048                 if (t < PATH_LENGTH)
00049                 {
00050                         result.x = STRAIGHT_LINE_POS(RIGHT_X, LEFT_X, t, PATH_LENGTH);
00051                         result.y = BOTTOM_Y;
00052                 }
00053                 else
00054                 {
00055                         result.x = result.y = -1;
00056                 }
00057                 return result;
00058         };
00059         ControlFunction sec4 = [](time_t t)->Vector3D{
00060                 Vector3D result;
00061                 if (t < PATH_LENGTH)
00062                 {
00063                         result.x = LEFT_X;
00064                         result.y = STRAIGHT_LINE_POS(BOTTOM_Y, TOP_Y, t, PATH_LENGTH);
00065                 }
00066                 else
00067                 {
00068                         result.x = result.y = -1;
00069                 }
00070                 return result;
00071         };
00072 
00073         Path p;
00074         p.push_back(sec1);
00075         p.push_back(sec2);
00076         p.push_back(sec3);
00077         p.push_back(sec4);
00078 
00079         PathController controller;
00080         controller.RegisterPath(p, 0);
00081 
00082         Environment* env = new Environment();
00083         env->home[0].pos.x = 0;
00084         env->home[0].pos.y = 0;
00085 
00086         while (1)
00087         {
00088                 controller.StepPaths(env, new MotionController());
00089                 std::cout << "Controller output - Left : " << env->home[0].velocityLeft << ", Right - " << env->home[0].velocityRight << std::endl;
00090                 Sleep(100);
00091         }
00092 }
